description.en:
Located in Gorki Gorod ski resort in Krasnaya Polyana, within a 30-minute drive of Fisht Olympic Stadium, Sochi Marriott Krasnaya Polyana Hotel offers ski storage and equipment. Gornaya Karusel ski lift is within a 5-minute walk of the hotel. The property also provides a free shuttle to the beach. Free WiFi is available throughout.

The elegant air-conditioned rooms feature luxury-style bedding, safety deposit box,fridge, work and seating areas with sofa and flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathrooms come with a bath or shower, hairdryer, bathrobe, slippers and free toiletries.

Guests are welcome to the on-site River Cafe where breakfasts are served daily. A-la-carte menu and kids meals are also offered throughout the day at L'Olivo, the Italian restaurant with a scenic outdoor terrace. Lobby bar and pool bar welcomes guests for a drink.

The property features a spa centre with a sauna, steam bath and indoor swimming pool. The outdoor swimming pool is also at guests' disposal. Guests are invited to have a workout at the fitness centre. A children's club with professional tutors is also available on site.

Gorki Mall Water Park is within a 2-minute walk away. Estosadok Train Station is 2 km from the hotel. Sochi Marriott Krasnaya Polyana Hotel is 45 km from Sochi-Adler International Airport, and 77 km from Sochi Train Station.

Элегантный номер с одной двуспальной кроватью или двумя раздельными односпальными кроватями. Санузел с душем или ванной укомплектован феном, халатами, тапочками и косметическими средствами итальянских марок.  Для работы в номере есть письменный стол, телефон, электронный сейф и wi-fi.
